reviews.text: i taste ths beer in kathandu recently and this is not a pilsener beer.taste is not really different than itâs own san miguel lager.i hate the shape of the bottle also.In general i wonât go for this beer.sorry about that.i would go with tuborg,everest or coblenzer.
Pours with a nice cream head, aroma is nice with a apricot overtone. The copper color is pleasing. Mildly sweet with a slight bitterness at the finish. A great sipping beer before a meal.

Coblenzer MÃ¤rzen clear golden amber brew with a caramel note.A slowly dissolving foam head. Aroma of sweet roasted malt, caramel and a hint of flowery hops. Taste is lightly carbonated, medium body, more caramel to the tongue, with hardly any bitterness.thin feel, average carbonation, thin feel, medium body, medium bitterness, light sweetness, amber, clear, frothy,
